props.name: labelClass
props.description: Class that is added to the label for custom styles

props.name: inputClass
props.description: Class that is added to the input for custom styles

props.name: contentClass
props.description: Class that is added to the slot wrapper for custom styles

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Show checkbox in indeterminate state. (NOTE: this is a visual-only state and there is no logic for when to show it)

props.name: customValue
props.description: The value when used in a checkbox group. Replaces `trueValue` and `falseValue`.
